data.text: An Oasis in the Heart of Dubai!My stay at Barceló Residences Dubai Marina was nothing short of exceptional. Nestled amidst the vibrant skyline of Dubai, this luxurious accommodation offers the perfect blend of city living and seaside charm. The apartments are spacious, elegant, and equipped with all the amenities one could ask for. The outdoor pool and hot tub provide a relaxing retreat after a day of exploring the nearby attractions, including the iconic Palm Jumeirah and the bustling Walk. With its convenient location and impeccable service, Barceló Residences Dubai Marina is truly the ideal choice for a memorable holiday with family, friends, or that special someone. Can't wait to return!
data.title: Oasis in the heart of Marina

data.text: Stayed here with two little kids with my husband while he was on business. Really great place for families because the apartments are really spacious and there’s a full kitchen with everything you need. The best part was the staff, always kind and helpful, especially the security guys when I needed to get in and out of taxis with a double stroller and two littles. Topher should also be mentioned, he brought my phone directly up to me when I left it downstairs at reception and didn’t even realize. The cleaning staff also great because they always restocked bottles of water each was nice.

data.text: Great location as you could walk to the beach and restaurants.  We stayed on the 29th floor in a one bedroom apartment.  Perfect as you got a good nights sleep, no noise from building works or traffic.  Apartment was really clean and had 2 bathrooms which was great.  I was there with my husband.  Bed so comfortable. Staff really nice and helpful.. My daughter who lives in Dubai was also able to stay a few nights and park her car in hotel car park free of charge.  Thanks for a great holiday. I would highly recommend.
data.title: Lovely Hotel and great Location.
